ygData.subject: Re: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: well if it got out that a dark elf cooperated with the paladins on rallos zek they would die multiple times... but you are correct that is the only case where
ygData.messageBody:
well if it got out that a dark elf cooperated with the paladins on rallos zek
they would die multiple times... but you are correct that is the only case
where language probably matters for paladins.

From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Date sent: Wed, 5 May 1999 15:24:12 -0700
Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] languages

> From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>
> I'm not a paladin there. It was just an example about the fact that a
> language could be useful. I have no example for paladins yet. :o(
> On the other hand, some agnostic Dark Elves are kind enough. And they can
> teach you I'm sure. Not all the Teir'Dals are evil.
>
> Erwin, Paladin of Tunare (Fennin Ro)
